itunes:title: Episode 720 - DB Sports Companion Show 11/17/20 - Picking College Odds With Berry Tramel
title: Episode 720 - DB Sports Companion Show 11/17/20 - Picking College Odds With Berry Tramel
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Oklahoma Hall Of Fame journalist Berry Tramel to chat about the NBA trade madness, tell us whether Spencer Rattler is the future for the Sooners, and we make our NFL and College picks for this weekend...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Oklahoma Hall Of Fame journalist Berry Tramel to chat about the NBA trade madness, tell us whether Spencer Rattler is the future for the Sooners, and we make our NFL and College picks for this weekend's games.

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Oklahoma Hall Of Fame journalist Berry Tramel to chat about the NBA trade madness, tell us whether Spencer Rattler is the future for the Sooners, and we make our NFL and College picks for this weekend's games.
